accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on #E07A5F (Primary) is White. Text on #F2CC8F (Accent) must be #3D405B (Dark).
accessibility.focus_states: Visible thick rings. Do not rely on color alone.
accessibility.screen_readers: All images must have alt text describing the emotion, not just the object.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Clay Warmth', 'Sage Health', and 'Eggshell' colors.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Go into /components/ui/button.jsx and card.jsx and force the rounded-full/rounded-3xl styles. Do not use default sharp corners.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Eggshell' (#F4F1DE) background for the entire body. Do not use white as the default background.
5. EMOTION: Every page should feel like a hug. Use generous padding (p-8, p-12). Avoid dense information clusters.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) as 'role-context-element' (e.g., 'btn-login-submit').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
